meta.project: Stock Analysis and User Management Platform

product_overview: This platform combines stock intrinsic value calculation with user management capabilities, providing investors with key financial insights alongside effective user administration tools.
core_goals: Enable users to calculate the intrinsic value of stocks using Graham's formula to support informed investment decisions.
Provide a comprehensive user management system including user listing, creation, and deletion.
Offer a responsive global header for seamless navigation across the platform.
Deliver a user-friendly home page with engaging content such as random quotes to enhance user experience.
key_features: User Management: listing users, adding new users with form validation, and deleting users with API integration, supporting state updates and error handling.
Intrinsic Value Calculator: functionality to compute intrinsic stock values based on Graham's formula accessible via a dedicated page.
Global Header: a responsive navigation header built with Next.js and Material UI ensuring a consistent user interface across devices.
Home Page: landing page featuring random motivational quotes to engage and motivate users upon visiting the site.
user_flow_summary: User visits the home page and views random quotes to gain inspiration.
User navigates via the global header to the User Management page to view existing users.
User creates a new user by entering email and name, then submits the form which triggers an API request and handles success or error states accordingly.
User can see loading indicators while user data is fetched, and a message "No users found" appears if no users exist.
User navigates to the Intrinsic Value Calculator page to input stock data and receive calculated intrinsic values for investment decisions.
validation_criteria: Ensure form inputs for creating users update the application state correctly.
Verify API requests trigger upon Create User button clicks and handle errors appropriately.
Confirm that loading indicators and 'No users found' messages display under correct conditions on the users page.
Check that the global header is responsive and provides seamless navigation on different device sizes.
Validate the intrinsic value calculator produces accurate outputs based on the input and Graham's formula.
Ensure that the blend of Tailwind CSS and Material UI styling maintains visual consistency across light and dark themes.
